long_description: Built of pure stainless steel and coated with titanium carbo-nitride, the sturdy Kershaw Cryo knife sports a clean, no-fuss design that happily tackles cutting tasks during your outdoor adventures. 8Cr13MoV stainless-steel blade with matte grey titanium carbo-nitride coating holds its edge and resists corrosion. SpeedSafe assisted-opening mechanism allows you to open the knife with one hand; steel liner locks the blade into the open position for secure use. Stainless-steel handle is also coated with matte grey titanium carbo-nitride for a sleek, uniform appearance. The Kershaw Cryo knife includes a reversible pocket clip for tip-up or tip-down carrying.
short_description: Built of pure stainless steel and coated with titanium carbo-nitride, the sturdy Kershaw Cryo knife sports a clean, no-fuss design that happily tackles cutting tasks during your outdoor adventures.
